<expected_start/> <follow_up/> <group_list/> <impact>3</impact> <implementation_plan>-- Physically rack switch in top of cabinet -- Ensure that redundant power supply is connected to the backup power circuit in the cabinet -- Ensure that first GBIC fibre connector (Gi0/1) connects to primary distribution switch -- Ensure that second GBIC fibre connector (Gi1/1) connects to secondary distribution switch -- Connect console port to cabinet management console -- Add switch to network management console -- Add switch to network monitoring console -- Add switch to ServiceNow CMDB
